Posts.EditableText:
Anyone have a quick idea how to get into the colors and properties for the big blue save bar/button on the top right of the game window?

The blue sticks out like a sore thumb with my game and I'm hoping to change it.  =D
Posts.HTML:
Anyone have a quick idea how to get into the colors and properties for the big blue save bar/button on the top right of the game window?

The blue sticks out like a sore thumb with my game and I'm hoping to change it. =D

Posts.EditableText:
Actually, I think I got it by using
```JS.eval ("$('#status.ui-widget-header').css('XXXX', 'YYYYY');")```
Posts.HTML:
Actually, I think I got it by using
JS.eval ("$('#status.ui-widget-header').css('XXXX', 'YYYYY');")
